name: LiE
description:
LiE, is a platformer Game!

You are a wizard,the hero of your village. One day you were kidnapped by evil wizards and trapped you in a castle! You must escape before the evil wizards, plan to destroy all good in the world! Its up to you and your platformer skils

Art by: Määttä, aZaamBie

Created by: aZaamBie, Max, Lassi Määttä

Created with Godot 3

Created for the Community Game Jam 2019!

!NOTE: Keep the LiE,pck with LiE.exe at all times otherwise, game wont function!
